# Taking On Tyson

| last_aired =
| num_episodes = 6
| num_seasons = 1
}}
Taking On Tyson is a television show on Animal Planet. The show stars the American boxer Mike Tyson competing in pigeon racing. Animal rights critiques criticized the series as being "animal cruelty."
